channel.title: Paying someone to help with Webclient error
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm willing to pay someone (not just some random) who has experience and can create a webclient for me. The source and client is from InsidiaX because my friend and I are buying out that server and the problem we are having is the god forsaken webclient. There is always an error that I get, and it's the same error every time. I talked to the Client maker and webclient maker (who already has a working webclient) and his is working fine, he tried to help me through the problem and nothing worked.
I jarred it and signed it exactly like he did and yet, his still works (even on my website I use), and mine doesn't. I always get this error: [img]http://i1143.photobucket.com/albums/n634/Blood_Veins/webclienterror.png[/img]
Something about the main class cannot be found? I include all of the files, excluding the ones you aren't supposed to include (cache) when I jar it and I make sure the client.class is in there.
If someone knows what to do about this and can explain to me the problem, I will pay them to fix it for me... Contact me please: MSN: cctrain13@hotmail.com Skype: blood_veins
Thanks.
Also, the original webclient/client creator told me that the problem was my jdk version? I tried like 5 different versions of it, between jdk6.1.0_21 to jdk7.1.0 and none of those worked.

item.title: Paying someone to help with Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @run_moneygod run moneygod
item.description:
@run_moneygod wrote:

pi or delta ? add me on msn tarb@live.co.uki

Read full topic
item.source: Paying someone to help with Webclient error

item.title: Paying someone to help with Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

You’re not allowed to pay for services, help is always free here.

Read full topic

item.title: Paying someone to help with Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @d34th0wnsu d34th0wnsu
item.description:
@d34th0wnsu wrote:

Hey guys, I’m willing to pay someone (not just some random) who has experience and can create a webclient for me. The source and client is from InsidiaX because my friend and I are buying out that server and the problem we are having is the god forsaken webclient. There is always an error that I get, and it’s the same error every time. I talked to the Client maker and webclient maker (who already has a working webclient) and his is working fine, he tried to help me through the problem and nothing worked.

I jarred it and signed it exactly like he did and yet, his still works (even on my website I use), and mine doesn’t. I always get this error:

Something about the main class cannot be found? I include all of the files, excluding the ones you aren’t supposed to include (cache) when I jar it and I make sure the client.class is in there.

If someone knows what to do about this and can explain to me the problem, I will pay them to fix it for me…
Contact me please:
MSN: cctrain13@hotmail.com
Skype: blood_veins

Thanks.

Also, the original webclient/client creator told me that the problem was my jdk version? I tried like 5 different versions of it, between jdk6.1.0_21 to jdk7.1.0 and none of those worked.
